SENT.plain: Acute disseminated candidiasis is a serious and difficult problem often seen in immunocompromised states
Appearance of a characteristic skin eruption is helpful in the diagnostic
We report below a case report of an eight year old girl with aplastic anemia who had received multiple courses of antibiotics
A profuse monomorphic papular nodular eruption subsequently appeared on the face, palms and soles
Candida tropicalis was identified from the skin biopsy taken from one such lesion
